name: Chapel Wolves
description: Beneath the chapel stones, they wait — not dead, only forgotten. Their hunger is generational.

name: Bound Flame Revenant
description: The flame doesn't die. It simply learns to walk.

name: The Seventh Name
description: No one remembers what it is. Only that they weren’t supposed to say it.

name: Outlander's Mirror
description: It speaks in your voice. Bleeds your regret. It is *you*, worse.

name: Gisela’s Wound
description: You didn't see her die. But the thing that rose after wears her rage like a crown.

name: Whispered Altar Husk
description: Its voice is hers. And sometimes, when it turns… so is the face.

name: The Pale Grin
description: It laughs with every wound you leave on it. And it bleeds nothing but memory.

name: Basilisk of Rust
description: A single eye. A thousand blades. It sees what your blood has hidden for generations.

name: He Who Waits Beneath
description: He does not knock. He does not crawl. He simply waits until the door opens.

name: Shadow Arion
description: The voice you buried. The thought you denied. The echo you deserve.
